data.oai_dc:dc: Hourly time-series of inshore significant wave height (Hs), peak wave period (Tp) and wave direction (Dir) at 10 m water depth directly seaward of each of the 5 beach profile survey transects. The combined measured/hindcast time-series was transformed to these five specific locations using the nearshore wave model SWAN. Refer to the ReadMe file for full descriptions of the data sources, transformation and file format.
